name: Asgard
description: The realm of the Aesir gods, including Odin and Thor.

name: Midgard
description: The realm of humans, located within the world tree Yggdrasil.

name: Jotunheim
description: The realm of the giants (Jotnar), enemies of the gods.

name: Vanaheim
description: The realm of the Vanir gods, associated with fertility and nature.

name: Alfheim
description: The realm of the light elves, known for their beauty and light magic.

name: Svartalfheim
description: The realm of the dark elves (Dwarves), skilled craftsmen and miners.

name: Niflheim
description: The icy realm of the dead, ruled by the goddess Hel.

name: Muspelheim
description: The realm of fire, home to fire giants and ruled by the fire giant Surtr.

name: Helheim
description: The realm of the dishonorable dead, ruled by the goddess Hel.

name: Valhalla
description: A majestic hall in Asgard where fallen warriors are taken after death.

name: Yggdrasil
description: The immense ash tree that connects the nine realms and sustains the cosmos.
